kw.name: Generate Random String
kw.doc: Generates a string with a desired ``length`` from the given ``chars``.

kw.name: Execute
Run And Return Rc And Output
kw.doc: Runs the given command in the system and returns the RC and output.
kw.msg: ${output} = 2019-08-31 05:22:08 INFO MetricsConfig:118 - Loaded properties from hadoop-metrics2.properties 2019-08-31 05:22:08 INFO MetricsSystemImpl:374 - Scheduled Metric snapshot period at 10 second(s). 2019...

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg: 2019-08-31 05:22:08 INFO MetricsConfig:118 - Loaded properties from hadoop-metrics2.properties 2019-08-31 05:22:08 INFO MetricsSystemImpl:374 - Scheduled Metric snapshot period at 10 second(s). 2019-08-31 05:22:08 INFO MetricsSystemImpl:191 - XceiverClientMetrics metrics system started 2019-08-31 05:22:10 INFO GrpcClientProtocolClient:255 - client-7BBA7CB95632->9017891e-0ab5-450e-b92e-26ca784835a7: receive RaftClientReply:client-7BBA7CB95632->9017891e-0ab5-450e-b92e-26ca784835a7@group-7A583B1B9461, cid=0, SUCCESS, logIndex=5, commits[9017891e-0ab5-450e-b92e-26ca784835a7:c5] 2019-08-31 05:22:10 INFO GrpcClientProtocolClient:255 - client-7BBA7CB95632->9017891e-0ab5-450e-b92e-26ca784835a7: receive RaftClientReply:client-7BBA7CB95632->9017891e-0ab5-450e-b92e-26ca784835a7@group-7A583B1B9461, cid=1, SUCCESS, logIndex=7, commits[9017891e-0ab5-450e-b92e-26ca784835a7:c8]

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Integers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to integers.

kw.name: Execute
Run And Return Rc And Output

kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to integers.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.
